      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a brand-new Player with default starting stats.
        Parameters:

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              float x,
              float y,
              int startingHealth,
              float speed,
              SkillSet skills,
              Inventory inventory)
        Creates a new Player with the specified information.
        Parameters:
        name - The Player's name.
        x - The Player's starting horizontal position.
        y - The Player's starting vertical position.
        startingHealth - The Player's starting maximum health.
        speed - The Player's speed.
        skills - The Player's skill set.
        inventory - The Player's inventory.

    • Method Detail

      • addBonus

        private void addBonus(Equipment e)

      • attack

        public int attack()
        Player deals damage based on their combat skills. Calculations for taking them into consideration, as well as randomness, are made here.
        Overrides:
        attack in class Creature
        Returns:
        The damage this creature deals.
        See Also:
        Creature.attack()

      • deleteBonus

        private void deleteBonus(Equipment e)
                  throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException

      • equip

        public int equip(Equipment e)
        Attempts to equip the given equipment on the Player, thus modifying their inventory as well as their attack, defense and critical bonuses. If the equipment belongs to a hand slot, it will default to the right hand, and will go to the left hand if the right is occupied.
        Parameters:
        e - The equipment item to equip.
        Returns:
        1 if the equipment could be equipped or 0 if not (i.e. no room in the inventory to store an already equipped item).

      • getAttack

        public int getAttack()

      • getCritical

        public int getCritical()

      • getDefense

        public int getDefense()

      • getEquipmentOn

        public java.lang.String getEquipmentOn(java.lang.String slot)
        Returns the String representation of the equipment on the given slot.
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot from which to get the equipment.
        Returns:
        The String representation of the equipment on the provided slot, or "Unequipped" if there is no such slot or if it's unoccupied.

      • receiveDamage

        public int receiveDamage(int damage)
        Description copied from class: Creature
        Damages this Creature the specified damage amount and returns the Creature's life after being hit.
        Overrides:
        receiveDamage in class Creature
        Parameters:
        damage - The amount of damage taken.
        Returns:
        The Creature's health after receiving damage.

      • unequip

        public boolean unequip(java.lang.String slotName)
        Unequips the item currently loaded onto the given slot.
        Parameters:
        slotName - The name of the slot to unequip.
        Returns:
        true if the slot could be unequipped or false if not (i.e. no such slot, slot is not occupied or there's no room to store equipment in inventory).

      • update

        public void update()
        Description copied from class: Entity
        An Entity can have behavior to update as the game progresses. Each subclass should specify its own behavior, if any.
        Specified by:
        update in class Creature
        See Also:
        Entity.update()

      • useItem

        public boolean useItem(Item e)
        Makes the Item be used by the player. If the item could be used, it is taken from the inventory
        Parameters:
        e - The item to be used by the player
        Returns:
        true if the item could be used, or false if not.
